Text: If enabled, the walking speed of beavers and bots will be modified.
The base walking speed of beavers (Game default: 2.7)
The base speed of beavers has been reduced (Game default: 1.5).
If enabled, bots will have different walking and working speeds. May have a minor performance impact.
The base walking speed of bots (Game default: 2.7)
The base speed of bots has been reduced (Game default: 1.5).
The multiplier for the maximum carrying weight of beavers and bots (Game default: 1). Note: does not take effect until reloading a save.
The multiplier for work speed of beavers (Game default: 1).
The multiplier for work speed of bots (Game default: 1).
